p.s: The impact when I watched the movie was incredible.
My perspective on racism was the same as before watching the movie but after watching it, it strengthedstrengthened my perspective.
When seeing the actor cry and scream I could emphatizeempathize with her even more.
The music and all the dramatic effects supported this impact too.
My idea about challenges of a teenager is that probably every teenager has different challenges.
Some may be easy but some difficult.
